directions.text: Combine flour, yeast, sugar and salt in a large bowl.
Make a well in the center of flour and pour in water.
Knead together until elastic consistency, about 10 mins.
Oil bowl, put dough back in and let stand for 1 hour 15 mins with a damp towel over the top.
Preheat oven to 450 and put a baking tray inside.
Cut dough in half and wrap with towel for 15 mins.
Flatten each piece of dough until it fits on the baking tray, then cover with towel for 10 more mins.
Whisk egg yolk and oil together in a bowl.
Add one piece of dough at a time to baking tray, brushing half egg mixture on top and lightly kneading half of the seeds on top.
Cook one piece at a time for 12 mins each.
